directions: Grind onion, pepper and garlic in meat grinder.  In a large saucepan combine ground vegetables, whole tomatoes, diced tomatoes, tomato puree, tomato paste, tomato sauce, vegetable oil and Italian seasoning. Bring to boil; reduce heat to simmer for 4 to 5 hours.  Stir occasionally.
ingredients: 2 (28 ounce) cans peeled and diced tomatoes
title: Pepe Vandel's Spaghetti Sauce
